class.name: InputMap
class.description: Manages all [InputEventAction] which can be created/modified from the project settings menu [code]Project > Project Settings > Input Map[/code] or in code with [method add_action] and [method action_add_event]. See [method Node._input].

method.name: action_add_event
method.description: Adds an [InputEvent] to an action. This [InputEvent] will trigger the action.

method.name: action_has_event
method.description: Returns [true] if an action has an [InputEvent] associated with it.

method.name: add_action
method.description: Adds an (empty) action to the [code]InputMap[/code]. An [InputEvent] can then be added to this action with [method action_add_event].

method.name: event_is_action
method.description: Returns [true] if the given event is part of an existing action. This method ignores keyboard modifiers if the given [InputEvent] is not pressed (for proper release detection). See [method action_has_event] if you don't want this behavior.

method.name: get_action_list
method.description: Returns an array of [InputEvent]s associated with a given action.

method.name: get_actions
method.description: Returns an array of all actions in the [code]InputMap[/code].

method.name: has_action
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]InputMap[/code] has a registered action with the given name.

method.name: load_from_globals
method.description: Clears all [InputEventAction] in the [code]InputMap[/code] and load it anew from [ProjectSettings].
